def_cn: 中名(名与姓之间的名字)
def_en: Your middle name is the name that comes between your first name and your surname.

def_cn: 突出的个性；明显的特征
def_en: You can use middle name in expressions such as 'discretion was her middle name' and 'his middle name is loyalty' to indicate that someone always behaves with a great deal of a particular quality.
